Package com.quantimodo.tools.sdk.request

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GetCategoriesRequest
    Get categories request Can be cached see getCachedSpiceRequest method, by default cached for 2 days
    GetCategoriesRequest.GetCategoriesResponse  
    GetPublicSuggestedVariablesRequest
    Get public suggested variables from search box Would sort them by latest measurement time DESC If now search string is provided, would search for Variables with source equals current application source
    GetPublicSuggestedVariablesRequest.Response  
    GetSuggestedVariablesRequest
    Get suggested variables from search box Would sort them by latest measurement time DESC If now search string is provided, would search for Variables with source equals current application source
    GetSuggestedVariablesRequest.GetSuggestedVariablesResponse  
    GetUnitsRequest
    Get units request Can be cached see getCachedSpiceRequest method, by default cached for 2 days
    GetUnitsRequest.GetUnitsResponse  
    GetVariableWithCacheRequest  
    GetVariableWithCacheRequest.Result  
    SdkRequest<T>
    Base class for request made for QuantimodoAPI Includes Quantimodo client, and AuthHelper.
    SearchCorrelationsRequest
    Search correlations by effect or by cause Can be cached see getCachedSpiceRequest method, by default cached for 2 min
    SearchCorrelationsRequest.CorrelationsResponse  
    SearchCustomCorrelationsRequest
    Search correlations by effect or by cause Can be cached see getCachedSpiceRequest method, by default cached for 2 min
    SearchCustomCorrelationsRequest.CorrelationsResponse  
    SendMeasurementsRequest
    Send measurements to Quantimodo WebService
    VoteCorrelationRequest
    Submit vote on correlation
  • Exception Summary

    NoNetworkConnection
    Thrown if there is no internet connection
